text: niscayanga, visvasula patla (muslinla patla) virodha visayanlo nivu yudulanu mariyu bahudaivaradhakunu (musrikin lanu), andari kante kathinuluga kanugontavu. Mariyu visvasula patla maitri visayanlo: "Niscayanga, memu kraistavulamu." Ani, anna varini atyanta sannihituluga pondutavu. Idi endukante varilo mataguruvulu/vidvansulu (khis'sisin) mariyu munulu (ruh ban) unnaru mariyu niscayanga, varu garvincaru
